line-9: Based in our central Birmingham office, you will work with the Capital Delivery leadership team, under the direction of the both the Head of Human Resources and Senior HR Business Partner to deliver the business aligned People Plan/HR strategy and provide coaching and support to members of the supported leadership team. You will provide pro-active, value-add HR support to the business leaders across Capital Delivery on medium term and operational people issues.
